user.title: PRE Distribuce HDO
user.description: Enter your HDO receiver command ID. You can find it on the yellow/white sticker on your HDO receiver or electricity meter.

error.invalid_command_id: Invalid receiver command ID. No HDO data found for this code.
error.cannot_connect: Cannot connect to PRE Distribuce server.

abort.already_configured: This receiver command ID is already configured.
